slides.script: I was so stressed, I forgot my anniversary. My wife was furious. I couldn't focus at work, snapped at my kids over nothing. I felt like I was losing control.
slides.image_prompt: Man with head in hands looking stressed and overwhelmed at messy desk. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Turns out, chronic stress was wrecking my health too. Headaches, insomnia, high blood pressure. My doctor warned me it could lead to heart disease if I didn't get it under control.
slides.image_prompt: Doctor showing stressed man medical chart with warnings circled in red. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I tried meditation, yoga, even prescription pills. Nothing worked. Then my trainer told me about an ancient herb called ashwagandha. Apparently, top athletes and CEOs have used it for centuries to stay calm under pressure.
slides.image_prompt: Ancient Indian artwork depicting royalty being presented with ashwagandha root. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I did some research and found out ashwagandha has been clinically proven to reduce cortisol, the stress hormone. It's even been shown to improve focus, energy and sleep quality. I had to try it.
slides.image_prompt: Scientific journals and research papers about ashwagandha benefits scattered on desk. Ultra photorealistic, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: But not all ashwagandha is created equal. It has to be the right potency and purity to really work. That's when I discovered KSM-66, the world's most researched ashwagandha, made right here in the USA.

slides.script: I started taking KSM-66 every morning. In 3 days, I was sleeping through the night. After a week, my wife said I seemed calmer. By week 2, I was handling work stress like a pro. I couldn't believe it.
